package br.com.ibicos.ibicos.api.mapper;

import br.com.ibicos.ibicos.api.dto.AdCityDTO;
import br.com.ibicos.ibicos.api.dto.AdCityDTO.AdCityDTOBuilder;
import br.com.ibicos.ibicos.api.dto.AdDTO;
import br.com.ibicos.ibicos.api.dto.AdDTO.AdDTOBuilder;
import br.com.ibicos.ibicos.api.dto.AdRegionAreaDTO;
import br.com.ibicos.ibicos.api.dto.AdRegionAreaDTO.AdRegionAreaDTOBuilder;
import br.com.ibicos.ibicos.api.dto.ProviderStatisticsDTO;
import br.com.ibicos.ibicos.api.dto.ProviderStatisticsDTO.ProviderStatisticsDTOBuilder;
import br.com.ibicos.ibicos.api.dto.ServiceCategoryDTO;
import br.com.ibicos.ibicos.api.dto.ServiceCategoryDTO.ServiceCategoryDTOBuilder;
import br.com.ibicos.ibicos.api.dto.UserDTO;
import br.com.ibicos.ibicos.api.dto.UserDTO.UserDTOBuilder;
import br.com.ibicos.ibicos.domain.entity.Ad;
import br.com.ibicos.ibicos.domain.entity.AdCity;
import br.com.ibicos.ibicos.domain.entity.AdRegionArea;
import br.com.ibicos.ibicos.domain.entity.ProviderStatistics;
import br.com.ibicos.ibicos.domain.entity.ProviderStatistics.ProviderStatisticsBuilder;
import br.com.ibicos.ibicos.domain.entity.ServiceCategory;
import br.com.ibicos.ibicos.domain.entity.User;
import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.List;
import javax.annotation.processing.Generated;
import org.springframework.stereotype.Component;

@Generated(
    value = "org.mapstruct.ap.MappingProcessor",
    date = "2022-03-13T08:51:09-0300",
    comments = "version: 1.4.1.Final, compiler: javac, environment: Java 11.0.13 (Ubuntu)"
)
@Component
public class AdMapperImpl implements AdMapper {

    @Override
    public AdDTO AdToAdDTO(Ad ad) {
        if ( ad == null ) {
            return null;
        }

        AdDTOBuilder adDTO = AdDTO.builder();

        adDTO.id( ad.getId() );
        adDTO.adDescription( ad.getAdDescription() );
        adDTO.serviceCategory( serviceCategoryToServiceCategoryDTO( ad.getServiceCategory() ) );
        adDTO.cities( adCityListToAdCityDTOList( ad.getCities() ) );
        adDTO.user( userToUserDTO( ad.getUser() ) );
        adDTO.providerStatistics( providerStatisticsToProviderStatisticsDTO( ad.getProviderStatistics() ) );

        return adDTO.build();
    }

    @Override
    public Ad AdDTOToAd(AdDTO adDTO) {
        if ( adDTO == null ) {
            return null;
        }

        Ad ad = new Ad();

        ad.setAdDescription( adDTO.getAdDescription() );
        ad.setId( adDTO.getId() );
        ad.setUser( userDTOToUser( adDTO.getUser() ) );
        ad.setServiceCategory( serviceCategoryDTOToServiceCategory( adDTO.getServiceCategory() ) );
        ad.setCities( adCityDTOListToAdCityList( adDTO.getCities() ) );
        ad.setProviderStatistics( providerStatisticsDTOToProviderStatistics( adDTO.getProviderStatistics() ) );

        return ad;
    }

    protected ServiceCategoryDTO serviceCategoryToServiceCategoryDTO(ServiceCategory serviceCategory) {
        if ( serviceCategory == null ) {
            return null;
        }

        ServiceCategoryDTOBuilder serviceCategoryDTO = ServiceCategoryDTO.builder();

        serviceCategoryDTO.categoryName( serviceCategory.getCategoryName() );

        return serviceCategoryDTO.build();
    }

    protected AdRegionAreaDTO adRegionAreaToAdRegionAreaDTO(AdRegionArea adRegionArea) {
        if ( adRegionArea == null ) {
            return null;
        }

        AdRegionAreaDTOBuilder adRegionAreaDTO = AdRegionAreaDTO.builder();

        adRegionAreaDTO.idArea( adRegionArea.getIdArea() );
        adRegionAreaDTO.areaName( adRegionArea.getAreaName() );

        return adRegionAreaDTO.build();
    }

    protected List<AdRegionAreaDTO> adRegionAreaListToAdRegionAreaDTOList(List<AdRegionArea> list) {
        if ( list == null ) {
            return null;
        }

        List<AdRegionAreaDTO> list1 = new ArrayList<AdRegionAreaDTO>( list.size() );
        for ( AdRegionArea adRegionArea : list ) {
            list1.add( adRegionAreaToAdRegionAreaDTO( adRegionArea ) );
        }

        return list1;
    }

    protected AdCityDTO adCityToAdCityDTO(AdCity adCity) {
        if ( adCity == null ) {
            return null;
        }

        AdCityDTOBuilder adCityDTO = AdCityDTO.builder();

        adCityDTO.idCity( adCity.getIdCity() );
        adCityDTO.cityName( adCity.getCityName() );
        adCityDTO.stateAbb( adCity.getStateAbb() );
        adCityDTO.regionArea( adRegionAreaListToAdRegionAreaDTOList( adCity.getRegionArea() ) );

        return adCityDTO.build();
    }

    protected List<AdCityDTO> adCityListToAdCityDTOList(List<AdCity> list) {
        if ( list == null ) {
            return null;
        }

        List<AdCityDTO> list1 = new ArrayList<AdCityDTO>( list.size() );
        for ( AdCity adCity : list ) {
            list1.add( adCityToAdCityDTO( adCity ) );
        }

        return list1;
    }

    protected UserDTO userToUserDTO(User user) {
        if ( user == null ) {
            return null;
        }

        UserDTOBuilder userDTO = UserDTO.builder();

        userDTO.id( user.getId() );

        return userDTO.build();
    }

    protected ProviderStatisticsDTO providerStatisticsToProviderStatisticsDTO(ProviderStatistics providerStatistics) {
        if ( providerStatistics == null ) {
            return null;
        }

        ProviderStatisticsDTOBuilder<?, ?> providerStatisticsDTO = ProviderStatisticsDTO.builder();

        providerStatisticsDTO.id( providerStatistics.getId() );
        providerStatisticsDTO.evaluation( providerStatistics.getEvaluation() );
        providerStatisticsDTO.evaluationsCounter( providerStatistics.getEvaluationsCounter() );
        providerStatisticsDTO.hiredServicesCounter( providerStatistics.getHiredServicesCounter() );
        providerStatisticsDTO.messagesCounter( providerStatistics.getMessagesCounter() );
        providerStatisticsDTO.visualizations( providerStatistics.getVisualizations() );
        providerStatisticsDTO.category( serviceCategoryToServiceCategoryDTO( providerStatistics.getCategory() ) );

        return providerStatisticsDTO.build();
    }

    protected User userDTOToUser(UserDTO userDTO) {
        if ( userDTO == null ) {
            return null;
        }

        User user = new User();

        user.setId( userDTO.getId() );

        return user;
    }

    protected ServiceCategory serviceCategoryDTOToServiceCategory(ServiceCategoryDTO serviceCategoryDTO) {
        if ( serviceCategoryDTO == null ) {
            return null;
        }

        ServiceCategory serviceCategory = new ServiceCategory();

        serviceCategory.setCategoryName( serviceCategoryDTO.getCategoryName() );

        return serviceCategory;
    }

    protected AdRegionArea adRegionAreaDTOToAdRegionArea(AdRegionAreaDTO adRegionAreaDTO) {
        if ( adRegionAreaDTO == null ) {
            return null;
        }

        AdRegionArea adRegionArea = new AdRegionArea();

        adRegionArea.setIdArea( adRegionAreaDTO.getIdArea() );
        adRegionArea.setAreaName( adRegionAreaDTO.getAreaName() );

        return adRegionArea;
    }

    protected List<AdRegionArea> adRegionAreaDTOListToAdRegionAreaList(List<AdRegionAreaDTO> list) {
        if ( list == null ) {
            return null;
        }

        List<AdRegionArea> list1 = new ArrayList<AdRegionArea>( list.size() );
        for ( AdRegionAreaDTO adRegionAreaDTO : list ) {
            list1.add( adRegionAreaDTOToAdRegionArea( adRegionAreaDTO ) );
        }

        return list1;
    }

    protected AdCity adCityDTOToAdCity(AdCityDTO adCityDTO) {
        if ( adCityDTO == null ) {
            return null;
        }

        AdCity adCity = new AdCity();

        adCity.setIdCity( adCityDTO.getIdCity() );
        adCity.setCityName( adCityDTO.getCityName() );
        adCity.setStateAbb( adCityDTO.getStateAbb() );
        adCity.setRegionArea( adRegionAreaDTOListToAdRegionAreaList( adCityDTO.getRegionArea() ) );

        return adCity;
    }

    protected List<AdCity> adCityDTOListToAdCityList(List<AdCityDTO> list) {
        if ( list == null ) {
            return null;
        }

        List<AdCity> list1 = new ArrayList<AdCity>( list.size() );
        for ( AdCityDTO adCityDTO : list ) {
            list1.add( adCityDTOToAdCity( adCityDTO ) );
        }

        return list1;
    }

    protected ProviderStatistics providerStatisticsDTOToProviderStatistics(ProviderStatisticsDTO providerStatisticsDTO) {
        if ( providerStatisticsDTO == null ) {
            return null;
        }

        ProviderStatisticsBuilder<?, ?> providerStatistics = ProviderStatistics.builder();

        providerStatistics.id( providerStatisticsDTO.getId() );
        providerStatistics.evaluation( providerStatisticsDTO.getEvaluation() );
        providerStatistics.evaluationsCounter( providerStatisticsDTO.getEvaluationsCounter() );
        providerStatistics.hiredServicesCounter( providerStatisticsDTO.getHiredServicesCounter() );
        providerStatistics.messagesCounter( providerStatisticsDTO.getMessagesCounter() );
        providerStatistics.visualizations( providerStatisticsDTO.getVisualizations() );
        providerStatistics.category( serviceCategoryDTOToServiceCategory( providerStatisticsDTO.getCategory() ) );

        return providerStatistics.build();
    }
}
